CS:GO stands as a glowing reminder that quality game design is rewarded in longevity and variety. Valve has not only updated the shooter but has completely outclassed its contemporaries. This is Counter-Strike, whatever the format you choose to play it on, and there isn't a higher recommendation than that.

This game should have never gone FTP ever. Now its free for all the cheaters and smurfs to make as many accounts as they want over and over and over again. To not have to deal with that we have to either pay for prime or deal with all the BS and reduced xp even further pushing people to pay for prime. It was just a play to both bolster their numbers for a struggling game and also push people to pay  to not deal with their joke anti cheat that doesnt work for crap. This used to be an amazing game that i could play for countless hours on end while nowadays i cant stand to play more than a couple games or matches before im sick of it

Great game to start shooters on pc or laptop!

Very good game, it may time some time for new players to really learn what weapons to use, and where things are in certain maps but after about 100 hours you get the main idea. you get to learn the basics of spray controls, maps, timings, and movement. Its fun to watch myself get better at this game. I don't take it too seriously, i play more casually than serious but that doesn't mean i troll, it just means that i'm not always doing my 100% best. Although i do sweat sometimes. But here's a fun fact: WARM UPS ARE VERY IMPORTANT. Also fix anti cheat please xD
